summary: Five people spend the night in an abandoned house, the Amityville haunted house, and soon find themselves terrorized by assorted ghosts, venomous insects and ghostly apparitions.
cast: Kim Coates|Dawna Wightman|Helen Hughes|David Stein|Anthony Dean Rubes|Cassandra Gava|Jan Rubes|Norris Domingue|Scott Yaphe|Mark Camacho|Tyrone Benskin|Ali Giron|Griffith Brewer|Ted A. Bohus|Richard Tassé
title: Amityville 5: La maldición de Amityville
